name: To Braver Shores
description:
To Braver Shores is a two-player exploration/strategy game designed by Luke D'Errico and Andrew Obeso. 

Players race each other to find treasure while exploring the ocean, encountering enemies, and upgrading their ships.

Features:

  • Randomized board spawning  for a unique experience each game.
  • Three encounterable enemies: Pirates, Krakens, and Tempests.
  • Four discoverable islands, each rewarding ship upgrades.
